text: @narendramodi Sir, I am working in champions informetrics in Karnataka they're saying they'll not pay us our salaries for March and April and are going to take out money from our salaries for the officially closed  days due to CoViD-19 which was enforced by you. Please help us regarding this. https://t.co/t0hjqO482j
